code: import React from'react';import'./CharacterList.scss';import CharacterCard from'./CharacterCard';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';var CharacterList=function CharacterList(props){var data=props.data,query=props.query,specie=props.specie;return React.createElement("ul",{className:"app__list"},data.filter(function(myCharac){return myCharac.species.toUpperCase().includes(specie.toUpperCase());}).filter(function(myCharac){return myCharac.name.toUpperCase().includes(query.toUpperCase());}).map(function(charac){return React.createElement("li",{className:"character",key:charac.id},React.createElement(Link,{to:"character/".concat(charac.id)},React.createElement(CharacterCard,{charac:charac})));}));};export default CharacterList;
